text: Sir Kenneth Percy Bloomfield (born 15 April 1931 died 31 May 2025) is an Irish politician. He was the former head of the Northern Ireland Civil Service. He was later a member of the Independent Commission for the Location of Victims' Remains and for a time Northern Ireland Victims Commissioner. In addition to this, he has held a variety of public sector posts in Northern Ireland and elsewhere. Bloomfield was born in Belfast, Northern Ireland. ==Other websites== *Independent Commission for the Location of Victims Remains Official Website Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:British civil servants Category:People from Belfast
title: Kenneth Bloomfield
